p: Although two models (a GAM and a BRT) were fitted to each individual species, the full overview of habitat associations for the entire waterbird assemblage was approached by grouping the waterbird species in 7 different guilds ( sensu, [ 45]: dabbling ducks, diving birds, fishing birds, large wading birds, raptors, small wading birds and vegetation gleaners; see Table 2 for the full list of species included in each guild).
